name: MPSImageMedian
desc: A filter that applies a median filter in a square region centered around each pixel in the source image.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelDiameter: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a filter for a particular kernel size and device.

items.name: class func maxKernelDiameter() -> Int
items.desc: Queries the maximum diameter, in pixels, of the filter window supported by the median filter.

items.name: class func minKernelDiameter() -> Int
items.desc: Queries the minimum diameter, in pixels, of the filter window supported by the median filter.

items.name: var kernelDiameter: Int
items.desc: The diameter, in pixels, of the filter window.
